description: Hello there! My name is Hadi Bakhshi, and I'm a skilled Front-end Developer with a passion for programming and a keen eye for design. At 24 years old, I'm motivated, hardworking, and always striving to improve myself in every way possible. Over the course of my career, I've been fortunate enough to work on a variety of challenging projects that have helped me grow as a developer. I take great satisfaction in overcoming obstacles and delivering high-quality results that exceed expectations. This drive to succeed led me to learn NextJS, a powerful full-stack framework for ReactJS, during my first project at my current company. Since then, my curiosity for server-side programming using NodeJS has only grown, inspiring me to learn even more.

Although I'm passionate about all aspects of development, my heart truly lies with front-end development. I take immense pride in my ability to create stunning, functional designs that are both user-friendly and visually appealing. I'm constantly searching for ways to improve user experience and optimize performance.

I consider myself to be an innovative and creative individual, and I believe that these qualities are essential to staying ahead of the curve in the fast-paced tech industry. I make it a priority to stay up-to-date with the latest tools and technologies, always looking for ways to improve and expand my skill set.

Overall, I'm committed to my craft and dedicated to delivering exceptional results that exceed expectations. I'm excited to take on new challenges and continue growing both personally and professionally.
